name: Dino Survival
description:
The most dangerous and adventurous time of the history is back!

Welcome to an island that is populated with the most dangerous and deadliest creatures that history has ever knew - dinosaurs! You are all alone on the island, there are no humans at all. Just you and wild nature. Guess what you have to do? That's right - you have to learn how to survive!

In Dino Survival your survival is under great danger because you have never faced such carnivores like dinosaurs before! You have to become a smart hunter! But before you go on the dino hunt you have to craft a suitable weapon for you. Go for a walk around the island, try to find some useful resources and then craft weapons and, what is most important, a shelter! Moreover you can try to be a peaceful farmer and grow vegetables. It is always up to you to decide.

Dino Survival game features:
- BIG island with new adventures;
- Beautiful open world;
- Wild animal hunting – goats, bears, boars, wolves, DINOSAURS etc.;
- You can be both a hunter and a farmer;
- Collect resources;
- Craft useful tools and deadly weapons;
- Build shelters and hide there from the danger;

If you are a big fan of survival games, if you like to look for a way out of almost hopeless situations and if you really love adventures then Dino Survival is a perfect game for you! Everything you need gathered together in one place: beautiful 3D graphics, perfect survival simulator and diverse crafting system. Play Dino Survival and enjoy your time and have fun! Good luck!
